attributes.action: Cancel Artical 50 and Remain in EU and have another Referendum
attributes.background: We had a vote in 2015 where the leave party Promised things that never happened. Also the Remain parties supported to remain and then fight to leave. So we need someone who can fight to keep us in and who can fight to cancel artical 50

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what question you want a referendum on.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions calling for article 50 to be revoked, followed by a referendum. You might like to sign one of these if it calls for something you want to happen. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237168

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245960
